items.name: lion-crest
items.description: A crest, with a lion's head on the front
items.messageWhenUsed: You place the crest into the door
items.messageWhenNotUsed: Cool lion, but what could this be for?

items.name: wine-bottle
items.messageWhenUsed: You place the wine bottle back in the rack
items.messageWhenNotUsed: It's a shame this is empty. Some wine would be good right now.

items.name: utility-key
items.description: A small key, with a tag that reads 'Utility'
items.messageWhenUsed: You unlock the door to the utility room
items.messageWhenNotUsed: This key doesn't seem to fit any locks here

items.name: sheet-music
items.description: Sheet music for Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 14
items.messageWhenNotUsed: An excellent piece of music. Though I'm not sure why I decided to steal it.

items.name: moose-head
items.description: A moose's head. Its cold, dead eyes stare at you, looking lost and lonely
items.messageWhenNotUsed: I will not rest until this is back where it belongs

items.name: keycode
items.description: A piece of paper with 2407 written on it
items.messageWhenUsed: You enter the keycode into the terminal

items.name: eagle-crest
items.description: A crest, with an eagle's head on the front
items.messageWhenUsed: You place the crest into the door
items.messageWhenNotUsed: What is this for? What does the eagle signify?

items.name: wolf-crest
items.description: A crest, with a wolf's head on the front
items.messageWhenUsed: You place the crest into the door
items.messageWhenNotUsed: This is a very unusual design

items.name: crowbar
items.messageWhenUsed: You prise off the wooden planks
items.messageWhenNotUsed: Nothing to use this on in here

items.name: statue-head
items.description: The head of a small statue.
items.messageWhenUsed: You place the head carefully back onto the statue
items.messageWhenNotUsed: What a strange thing to have found. I wonder who it's meant to be?

items.name: handle
items.description: A metal handle. It looks like it's for some sort of trap door.
items.messageWhenNotUsed: I'm not sure where I could put this...

items.name: small-key
items.description: A small key, with a tag that says 'S.Q.'
items.messageWhenNotUsed: It doesn't look like this can be used here
